dict.acceptation: 手脚能够到的范围；范围，区域；影响的范围，管辖的范围；

sent.orig: Experts will introduce REACH bill which could help you technical barrier.
sent.trans: 本次峰会邀请欧盟REACH法规专家为您解析REACH法案的精髓，助您的产品顺利跨越壁垒。

sent.orig: Cosmetics are exempt from REACH as far as the human health implications are concerned.
sent.trans: REACH在影响人体健康方面对化妆品不作注册要求。

sent.orig: What REACH Means for Manufacturers and Importers.
sent.trans: REACH对制造商和进口商来说意味着什么。

sent.orig: Do you know the status of your products as concerns REACH?
sent.trans: 你明白涉及到REACH的产品在你公司的地位吗？

sent.orig: This is partly because they have invested years in REACH, which began in 2001.
sent.trans: 这一部分是由于他们从2001年起，费时数年投入到REACH中。
